Just as Karl Toosbuy believed the foot should lead the shoe, so do people power a company. Comprising more than 20,000 people, the ECCO family is diverse, innovative, creative, and strong. Founded in Los Angeles in 2014, The Good Trade is the leading resource for those seeking to live an inspired and intentional life.

Just as Karl Toosbuy believed the foot should lead the shoe, so do people power a company. Comprising more than 20,000 people, the ECCO family is diverse, innovative, creative, and strong. We serve a highly-engaged readership of millions of women and men who care deeply about the brands they support and the social and environmental impact of their lifestyle choices through our website, daily newsletter, and cross-channel social media presence.
